languages.text: "Обряд благословения на священную охоту. Им Домин отпускает свою тень на кровавую тропу. С твоим благословением я стану разить сильнее и ступать тише".
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
languages.original_text: "Обряд благословения на священную охоту. Им Домин отпускает свою тень на кровавую тропу. С твоим благословением я стану разить сильнее и ступать тише".

traits.locale_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, Enim casts their shadow on the path of carnage. With your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, Enim casts their shadow on the path of carnage. With your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, Enim will cast their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, Enim will cast their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
"The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

languages.text: "Das Ritual der Segnung für die heilige Jagd. Damit legt {mf|der|die} Domin {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten über den Pfad des Gemetzels. Unter Eurem Segen werde ich härter zuschlagen und sanfter auftreten."
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

traits.locale_text: "Das Ritual der Segnung für die heilige Jagd. Damit legt {mf|der|die} Domin {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten über den Pfad des Gemetzels. Unter Eurem Segen werde ich härter zuschlagen und sanfter auftreten."

languages.text: «El rito de bendición de la cacería sagrada. Mediante él, nuestro Domin proyecta su sombra sobre la senda de la matanza. Con su bendición, golpearé con más fuerza y caminaré con más sigilo».
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

traits.locale_text: «El rito de bendición de la cacería sagrada. Mediante él, nuestro Domin proyecta su sombra sobre la senda de la matanza. Con su bendición, golpearé con más fuerza y caminaré con más sigilo».

languages.text: 「聖なる狩りの祝福の儀式。これでドミンは殺戮の道に影を落とす。あなたの祝福の下、私はより強く攻撃して、より穏やかに歩むことができる」
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる狩りの祝福の儀式。これでエニムは殺戮の道に影を落とす。あなたの祝福の下、私はより強く攻撃して、より穏やかに歩むことができる」

languages.text: “是神圣狩猎的祝福仪式。举行仪式之后，秘者便会在屠戮的道路上投下阴影。在你的祝福之下，我的脚步会变得更轻，攻击也会变得更加致命。”
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

traits.locale_text: “是神圣狩猎的祝福仪式。举行仪式之后，秘者便会在屠戮的道路上投下阴影。在你的祝福之下，我的脚步会变得更轻，攻击也会变得更加致命。”

languages.text: « Le rite de la bénédiction de la chasse sacrée. Grâce à lui, {mf|le|la} Domin projette son ombre sur la voie du carnage. Votre protection me permettra de frapper plus fort et de me mouvoir plus discrètement. »
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."

traits.locale_text: « Le rite de la bénédiction de la chasse sacrée. Grâce à lui, {mf|le|la} Domin projette son ombre sur la voie du carnage. Votre protection me permettra de frapper plus fort et de me mouvoir plus discrètement. »

languages.text: "Kutsal av için bir kutsama ayini. Bu törenle birlikte kıyım yoluna Domin'in gölgesi düşer. Nimetin ışığında daha sert saldırıp daha yumuşak adımlar atacağım."
languages.original_text: "The rite of blessing for the sacred hunt. With it, the Domin casts their shadow over the path of carnage. Under your benediction, I will strike harder and tread more softly."
